subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United fell from the top of the English Premier League standings after losing to Norwich, 1-0, while its crosstown rival, Manchester City, routed Aston Villa, 5-0, to reach first place for the first time this season.
snippet: Manchester United fell from the top of the English Premier League standings after losing to Norwich, 1-0, while its crosstown rival, Manchester City, routed Aston Villa, 5-0, to reach first place for the first time this season.
